name: Emirates First Class Lounge - Dubai Concourse A
description: Dubai Airport is one of the busiest in the world - one sanctuary from the crowds is the Emirates First Class Lounge.  The lounge is available to those flying first class with Emirates or Qantas as well as Qantas Platinum Frequent Flyers.   This video features the lounge in Concourse A which stretches the entire length of the terminal with entry onto your aircraft direct from the lounge.
